mapper.sql: ID, DPRTCODE, WHBMID, WHRID, WHSJ, ZT, FJJX, GBBH, GBMC, SZQYWZ, KGGS, HGGS, QY, RLGBBS
mapper.select:
select
from D_021 where DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ZT = 1
and (lower(GBBH) like lower('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or lower(GBMC) like lower('%'||#{keyword}||'%'))
and FJJX = #{fjjx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by GBBH asc
mapper.insert: insert into D_021 (ID, DPRTCODE, WHBMID, WHRID, WHSJ, ZT, FJJX, GBBH, GBMC, SZQYWZ, KGGS, HGGS, QY, RLGBBS) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fjjx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gbbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gbmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{szqywz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kggs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hggs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{qy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rlgbbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update D_021
DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHBMID = #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FJJX = #{fjjx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GBBH = #{gbbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GBMC = #{gbmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SZQYWZ = #{szqywz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KGGS = #{kggs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HGGS = #{hggs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
QY = #{qy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RLGBBS = #{rlgbbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update D_021 set DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHBMID = #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FJJX = #{fjjx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GBBH = #{gbbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GBMC = #{gbmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SZQYWZ = #{szqywz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KGGS = #{kggs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HGGS = #{hggs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QY = #{qy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RLGBBS = #{rlgbbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update D_021 set WHBMID = #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GBMC = #{gbmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SZQYWZ = #{szqywz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KGGS = #{kggs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HGGS = #{hggs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QY = #{qy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RLGBBS = #{rlgbbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where GBBH = #{gbbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and FJJX = #{fjjx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select t.ID, t.DPRTCODE, t.WHBMID, t.WHRID, t.WHSJ, t.ZT, t.FJJX, t.GBBH, t.GBMC, t.SZQYWZ, t.KGGS, t.HGGS,t.QY,t.RLGBBS ,t1.username||' '||t1.realname WHRXM ,t2.DPRTNAME from D_021 t left join t_user t1 on t.whrid=t1.id left join t_department t2 on t.dprtcode=t2.id
and lower(t.GBBH) like lower('%'||#{keyword}||'%' )
order by t.WHSJ DESC
order by ${pagination.sort} ${pagination.order}

select t.ID, t.DPRTCODE, t.WHBMID, t.WHRID, t.WHSJ, t.ZT, t.FJJX, t.GBBH, t.GBMC, t.SZQYWZ, t.KGGS, t.HGGS,t.QY,t.RLGBBS ,t1.username||' '||t1.realname WHRXM ,t2.DPRTNAME from D_021 t left join t_user t1 on t.whrid=t1.id left join t_department t2 on t.dprtcode=t2.id
and (lower(t.GBBH) like lower('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or lower(t.GBMC) like lower('%'||#{keyword}||'%'))
AND exists ( SELECT 1 from D_007 where t.fjjx = FJJX AND t.dprtcode = DPRTCODE AND zt = 1 )
AND exists ( SELECT 1 from V_ROLE_JX where t.fjjx= FJJX AND t.dprtcode = DPRTCODE AND USER_ID = #{paramsMap.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
order by t.WHSJ DESC
order by ${pagination.sort} ${pagination.order}
select ID from D_021 where DPRTCODE= #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and FJJX = #{jx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ZT = 1 and GBBH = #{sz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
